summary: A lightweight parsing framework that allows users to define grammars through composable expression objects, compile them into an optimized internal structure, and parse input strings or token streams to generate parse trees, with built‑in error handling, node visitation, and utility helpers.
business_intent: To give developers an easy‑to‑use yet powerful tool for constructing custom parsers, facilitating extraction and analysis of structured information from textual or tokenized data.
